revised_title: Dating of Luna 16 and Luna 20 Samples
tldr: The authors dated two fragments of Luna 16 mare basalt and two Luna 20 samples using the argon dating technique. The results confirm that mare lavas were extruded in Mare Fecunditatis 3.4-3.5 Ga ago. The age of the Luna 20 metaclastic fragment provides further support for a 3.9 Ga age for the Crisium basin and the widespread cataclysmic bombardment of the moon between 4.05 and 3.85 Ga.
